mapper.sql: a.id_ AS "id", a.user_id_ AS "userId", a.subject_version_name_ AS "subjectVersionName", a.subject_type_ AS "subjectType", a.score_ AS "score", a.create_date_ AS "createDate", a.update_date_ AS "updateDate", a.blank_one_ AS "blankOne", a.blank_two_ AS "blankTwo"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_subject_version( id_, user_id_, subject_version_name_, subject_type_, score_, create_date_, update_date_, blank_one_, blank_two_ ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{userId}, #{subjectVersionName}, #{subjectType}, #{score}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{blankOne}, #{blankTwo} )
mapper.update: UPDATE user_subject_version SET id_ = #{id}, user_id_ = #{userId}, subject_version_name_ = #{subjectVersionName}, subject_type_ = #{subjectType}, score_ = #{score}, create_date_ = #{createDate}, update_date_ = #{updateDate}, blank_one_ = #{blankOne}, blank_two_ = #{blankTwo} WHERE id = #{id}
